cookieConsent.title: About Cookies
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, including saving your invite code and other essential features. By continuing to use this website, you agree to our use of cookies.
cookieConsent.details: We only use essential functional cookies (such as invite code association) and do not collect or share your personal information for advertising or tracking purposes. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings at any time.
